title.text: What Kind of Entrepreneur’s Legacy Are You?

image.alt: What Kind of Entrepreneur’s Legacy Are You?

copyright.title: Summer fruit salad ingredients, strawberry, blackberry, cherry
copyright.author: Michael Stern

personalities.name: The Risk-Taker 🚨
personalities.description:
•You’re running on hope, not planning. If something happens, your family and business could face long delays, frozen accounts, and disputes.
•CTA: “Secure your legacy now – Book a free 1-on-1 session.”

personalities.name: The Improviser ⚖
personalities.description:
•You’ve thought about succession, but without proper legal steps, your business continuity is still at risk.
•CTA: “Turn your good intentions into a plan – Book your Legacy Strategy Session.”

personalities.name: The Visionary 🌟
personalities.description:
•Great job! You’ve taken steps to protect both your family and your business. Regular reviews ensure your plan stays solid.
•CTA: “Keep your legacy strong – Review with a Legacy Planner today.”

answers.text: I’m not sure – probably my family?
My family members, but not officially documented
I have a will and a shareholder agreement

questions.text: Who will inherit your company shares if something happens to you?

answers.text: My co-founders will figure it out

questions.text: What happens to your company’s bank accounts if you (the sole signatory) are gone?

image.alt: Space-filling model of the folic acid molecule, a B vitamin and an important compound in cell division

answers.text: No, I haven’t thought about it

image.alt: Space-filling model of the folic acid molecule, a B vitamin and an important compound in cell division

answers.text: Yes, clearly documented with legal backup

questions.text: Have you named a successor or transition plan for your business?

answers.text: We’ve talked about it, but not signed

questions.text: Do your business partners have a Buy-Sell Agreement?

answers.text: Not sure / Maybe a few weeks

questions.text: How long do you think probate (court process) takes without a will?
